original_text: I tell my servant to come to me but he does not come. I ask him to help me, but he does nothing. I tell my servant to come to me but he does not come. I ask him to help me, but he does nothing. I tell my servant to come to me
korean_text: 내가 내 종을 불러도 대답하지 아니하니 내 입으로 그에게 간청하여야 하겠구나

sentences.original_text: I tell my servant to come to me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 종에게 내게 오라고 말한다

sentences.original_text: I ask him to help me
I tell my servant to come to me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 종에게 내게 오라고 말한다
